channel.title: Need help with npc saying offline or online

item.title: Need help with npc saying offline or online
item.dc:creator: @Tyler1993 Tyler1993
item.description:
@Tyler1993 wrote:

lol its on every server ok

it supposed to do that if u log in and there are like 10 ppl then u come in it says ur offline… but then if another person comes in then it will say ur online so other ppl have to log in after u for it to work

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with npc saying offline or online

item.title: Need help with npc saying offline or online
item.dc:creator: @leaderofel leaderofel
item.description:
@leaderofel wrote:

where do i put that in?

Code:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 3081) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 20) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“liltwixis11”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner liltwixis11 is ONLINE”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Owner liltwixis11 is OFFLINE”;
}
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with npc saying offline or online

item.title: Need help with npc saying offline or online
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

[quote=“liltwixis11, post:8, topic:71545”]u meen from
if (npcs[i].npcType == 2167) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Soalreaver”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “OH NO Soalreaver is OFLINE!”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “OH YEH Soalreaver is ONLINE!”;
}
}
}
to
if (npcs[i].npcType == 2167) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Soalreaver”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “OH YEH Soalreaver is ONLINE!”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “OH NO Soalreaver is OFLINE!”;
}
}
}
though with my name ofcourse[br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2007, 08:53:00 PM[/size][hr]…[br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2007, 09:07:24 PM[/size][hr]sum1 help![/quote]
yes do that, but dobnt forget to put your name as a capital L

item.title: Need help with npc saying offline or online
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2167) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Soalreaver")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "OH YEH Soalreaver is ONLINE!"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "OH NO Soalreaver is OFLINE!"; } } }

Thats a working code if that helps?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2007, 02:28:47[/size][hr]oh i just notised… try makeing your first letter a capital L i login as soalreaver but it shows as Soalreaver, i put a cap and it works
